member.summary: Creates a new article, does NOT save it to the database before returning a copy for editing.
member.returns: Unsaved article ready to edit and save

remarks.para:
Creates a new article, unsaved, ready to edit. Uses to get the layout, and builds the using method
.

If a template ID is given, the contents of this article is loaded with content from the
.

member.name: M:CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Data.Logic.ArticleLogic.TrashArticle(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method puts an article into trash, and, all its versions.

remarks.para: This method puts an article into trash. Use to restore an article.
WARNING: Make sure the menu MenuController.Index does not reference deleted files.

member.name: M:CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Data.Logic.ArticleLogic.RetrieveFromTrash(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves and article and all its versions from trash.

remarks.para: Please be aware of the following:

list.item: will be altered if a live article exists with the same title.
If the title changed, the will be updated using .
The article and all its versions are set to unpublished ( set to null).

member.name: M:CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Data.Logic.ArticleLogic.UpdateOrInsert(CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Models.ArticleViewModel,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Updates an existing article, or inserts a new one.

remarks.para:
If the article number is '0', a new article is inserted. If a version number is '0', then a new version is created. Recreates using method
.

list.item:
Actions taken here by users are logged using
.
Title changes (and redirects) are handled by adding a new article with redirect info.
Publishing and cache management is handled by

The that is returned, is rebuilt using
.
Flushes REDIS cache for both data and the page using .

member.remarks: This action is used only for "publishing" entire websites.

member.name: M:CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Data.Logic.ArticleLogic.HandleUrlEncodeTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a standard method for turning a title into a URL Encoded path.
member.param: Title to be converted into a URL.

remarks.para: This is accomplished using .
Blanks are turned into underscores (i.e. "_").
All strings are normalized to lower case.

member.summary: Makes an article the new home page.
member.remarks:
The old home page has its URL changed from "root" to its normal path. Also writes to the log using
. Also flushes REDIS cache for the home page.

member.name: T:CDT.Cosmos.Cms.Common.Models.Attributes.ArticleTitleValidation
member.summary: Validates that a title is valid.

remarks.para: This validator checks for the following:

list.item: That the title is not null or empty space.
Ensures the title must be unique.
Prevents titles from being named "root," which is a key word.

remarks.para: Note: This validator will return invalid if it cannot connect to the .
